name: BilletlugenPrintable
description: On billetlugen.dk, print only the most essential info on arrangement pages.  Avoids wasting ink/PDF-space on advertisements, other images, social media stuff etc.

user.name: dknyt
user.about: Danish Firefox user on Fedora Linux

additional_info:
* 20150721 r3.0.0: Updated for current web design
- Remove a lot of empty space between heading and main content
- Display ticket info at bottom of (last) page at any printing scale

* 20141127 r2.2.0: Hide more ads recently added to web design

* 20141011 r2.1.0: Properly hide bottom section of related events

* 20141011 r2.0.0: Rewritten for the completely new web design

* 20141005 r1.0.0: First public release
